titleStmt.title: Hagiographic Dossier of St Mercurius Philopater

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

abstract.p: The hagiographic dossier containing the Acts, the Miracles, and the Hymns in honour of St Mercurius

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain an unspecified version of Martyrium / Gadl of St Mercurius

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain the Martyrdom of Mercurius (recension α)

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain the Martyrdom of Mercurius (recension b)

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may the Vita of Mercurius (recension c)

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain unspecified Miracles of Mercurius

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain the Miracle of Mercurius: Miracle of Mercurius: Death of the Emperor Julian the Apostate (version b)

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain the Miracle of Mercurius: Miracle of Mercurius: Death of the Emperor Julian the Apostate (version a)

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain Malkǝʾ-hymn to St Mercurius

relation.name: saws:contains
relation.desc: The dossier may contain Salām-hymn to Mercurius

relation.desc: The dossier may contain Malkəʾa Marqorewos
